# EnvironmentBlendingComponent.BlendingMode

**Structure**

A struct that encapsulates the different environment-blending modes that can be applied to an entity.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BlendingMode
```

## Type Properties

- **default**: No special blending is applied.

## Type Methods

- **occluded(by:)**: The entity receives a depth-based occlusion treatment within the specified environment type.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The entity receives a depth-based occlusion treatment within the specified environment type.
